document.heading: BNA Washington, Inc., Real Property Tax Deferral Amendment Act of 1996

history.narrative: Law 11-250, the “BNA Washington, Inc., Real Property Tax Deferral Amendment Act of 1996,” was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 11-818, which was referred to the Committee of the Whole. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on November 7, 1996, and December 3, 1996, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on December 24, 1996, it was assigned Act No. 11-514 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review. D.C. Law 11-250 became effective on April 9, 1997.
